title: FAKE CURRENCY DETECTOR
description: Detecting counterfeit currency notes using image processing and deep learning techniques, specifically CNN (Convolutional Neural Network).

title: REMOTE VILLAGE (E-LEARNING PORTAL)
description: This platform is designed specifically for students in remote villages, enabling them to access digital learning content.

title: SAFE REACH CONTACT ACCESS PORTAL
description: This is a project provide secure access to critical contact information from any device during emergency situations.

title: FOOD ORDERING WEB APP
description: FOOD DELIVERY WEB APP Using MERN stack with Stripe payments, separate admin panel, authentication and live orders.
